dghost tagged this: #yup #gpoy #the sad thing is #there’s always some bigger badder motherfucker out there #even if it’s just a germ #or a tiny bit of explosives #it doesn’t matter who you are #eventually you’ll run into something that you could never hope to win against #eventually you’ll find something that you’re simply just not capable of handling #it’s best to bring friends along for the ride #because they are the ones who give you a fighting chance when that happens
quote-text: Until a man is twenty-five, he still thinks, every so often, that under the right circumstances he could be the baddest motherfucker in the world. If I moved to a martial-arts monastery in China and studied real hard for ten years. If my family was wiped out by Colombian drug dealers and I swore myself to revenge. If I got a fatal disease, had one year to live, and devoted it to wiping out street crime. If I just dropped out and devoted my life to being bad.
